game.name: Dragon Battles Multiplayer
game.description:
The highly challenging and thrilling 3D dragon simulator is here! Would you like to try it out and show off the world that you are a big lover of the deadly dragons? Join Dragon Battles Multiplayer and be prepared to get participated in PVP battles against other dangerous dragons! Be careful and come into action to finish off AI characters that can shoot from the ground too! Plenty of maps, weapons to use and lots of other exciting things to explore in this brand new action game.

Try to shoot down everything that moves on the screen and clear the area from all the deadly obstacles in this HTML5 shooting game! It is time to challenge your different maneuvers and try to survive until you achieve you objective. There are 3 unique and challenging maps to use and different modes including battle royale, death-match, team death-match, and even zombie mode to explore. Fight against other online players or choose to play against AI dragons!

It seems that you have today become a powerful dragon that is looking forward to protecting its tribe from a horde of dangerous enemies. Use a special radar to detect your enemy and fly your dragon and attack on them in this multiplayer online game! Try to keep you away from being attacked by your enemies and throw your enemies using your fiery breath! Kill enemies to get points and secure additional strength! Enjoy more free dragon games that are playable on multiple devices, no download required!
game.metaTitle: Dragon Battles Multiplayer Games - Play Online Free : Atmegame.com
game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Dragon Battles Multiplayer at atmegame.com ! We have selected this  games for best excitement and thrill in you!

game.webControlKeys: W,A,S,D ALLA RROWS TO MOVE,SPACE- FLY UP,L SHIFT- SPRINT,Q-JUMP,C-DOWN,R-DODGE,L-R CLICK OF MOUSE TO ATTACK
